name: Aeroklub Warszawski
about: Aeroklub Warszawski, founded in October 1927, is a prestigious flying school and aero club based in Warsaw, Poland. With a rich history spanning nearly a century, the club is dedicated to promoting and popularizing air sports, flight training, and recreational flying. Since its inception, Aeroklub Warszawski has been a hub for aviation enthusiasts, offering comprehensive flight training programs and fostering a community of pilots and aviation professionals. The club provides a range of services, including private pilot licenses, advanced flight training, and recreational flying opportunities, making it a cornerstone of aviation education and recreation in Poland. Aeroklub Warszawski continues to inspire and educate the next generation of pilots and aviation enthusiasts.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School"]
